channel.title: [SOLVED] Shop Prices change (Client 3gp -Server 2MILL).. how?
channel.description:
I had an issue...
when i buy something on shops, my client says.. HALLOWEEN MASK 2gp.. and at my server i remember i put something like 2 Million coins for it.. Where do i change the price in the webclient of RSCD so it wont be 2gp...
Because anyways it doesnt let you buy it
Cheers

item.dc:creator: @axp axp
item.description:
@axp wrote:

Thank you guys for your help, its been really apreciated

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Shop Prices change (Client 3gp -Server 2MILL).. how?
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:13, topic:401643"][quote author=Anc13ntsIsBack link=topic=498704.msg3659925#msg3659925 date=1310289240]

Keith is an idiot(as usual)…Just use 7zip.

I could use 7zip(Which I have). I just like doing it my way. It’s faster I think since I can just add about 10 Files in the input edit them all, click compress and then they’re all compressed and just place them back in.
[/quote]
Dude seriously…It’s not faster, u can select more than 1 with 7zip and extract them right away, without moving the files into some crap compression tool input folder and then clicking a batch file and then opening output folder and then moving them back to client…[/quote]
Haven’t used 7z much really. I’ll try it though.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Shop Prices change (Client 3gp -Server 2MILL).. how?
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Here -
http://www.speedyshare.com/files/29353003/Compression_Tool.zip

Add the Items.Rscd in the “Input” Folder, then run the Decompress All Batch file.

The Decompressed Items.Rscd will be in the Output File. Right Click > Edit in Notepad++ or w\e you use.

Once finished copy it. Place it in the Input Folder, then run the Compress All Batch file.
Go to the Output Folder, copy it place it in the client.

Oh & Set your paths in the batch.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Shop Prices change (Client 3gp -Server 2MILL).. how?
item.dc:creator: @putaz putaz
item.description:
@putaz wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:4, topic:401643"][quote author=xEnt link=topic=498704.msg3653122#msg3653122 date=1309855459]

Items.rscd.xml or whatever (I haven’t used RSCD in like 2 years)

Although I removed the check in ShopHandler.java as I didn’t see any reason for it.

The check was there for protection against clientside price editing.

nah, because the server didn’t use the client-side value to purchase the price. it simply compared it with the server’s price. the reason for this is because let’s say someone was using an old client and a dragon axe was 200k on the old client, but server-side it’s 800k. if he bought it he loses 800k if he had that much in his inventory. it’s simply disallowing him to buy something he’s expecting the price to be. could be more, or less.
[/quote]
Also for that.[/quote]

Do you live here to spam?

Read full topic

nah, because the server didn’t use the client-side value to purchase the price. it simply compared it with the server’s price. the reason for this is because let’s say someone was using an old client and a dragon axe was 200k on the old client, but server-side it’s 800k. if he bought it he loses 800k if he had that much in his inventory. it’s simply disallowing him to buy something he’s expecting the price to be. could be more, or less.[/quote]
Also for that.
